title: The Attention Cocktail from The Hawthorne Recipe
full_text:
The Attention Cocktail from The Hawthorne Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
2 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
Tanqueray
gin
3/4
ounces
Dolin
dry vermouth
1
barspoon
absinthe
1
barspoon
Crème de Violette
2
dashes
orange bitters
1
(2-inch) piece
lemon rind
Directions
Combine gin, vermouth, absinthe, crème de violette, and bitters in a mixing glass. Fill with ice and stir. Strain and serve in a chilled coupe glass. Squeeze lemon rind over the top and rub around the rim. Serve.
Special equipment
mixing glass, bar spoon, coupe glass
Gin
